channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Registration, Login Form, User Profile & Membership – ProfilePress (Formerly WP User Avatar)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Registration, Login Form, User Profile & Membership – ProfilePress (Formerly WP User Avatar)

item.title: CVE-2021-24955|2024-08-03T19:49:13.992Z -- unknown -- user%20registration%2C%20login%20form%2C%20user%20profile%20%26%20membership%20%E2%80%93%20profilepress%20%28formerly%20wp%20user%20avatar%29
item.description: The User Registration, Login Form, User Profile & Membership WordPress plugin before 3.2.3 does not escape the data parameter of the pp_get_forms_by_builder_type AJAX action before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue

item.title: CVE-2021-24954|2024-08-03T19:49:13.543Z -- unknown -- user%20registration%2C%20login%20form%2C%20user%20profile%20%26%20membership%20%E2%80%93%20profilepress%20%28formerly%20wp%20user%20avatar%29
item.description: The User Registration, Login Form, User Profile & Membership WordPress plugin before 3.2.3 does not sanitise and escape the ppress_cc_data parameter before outputting it back in an attribute of an admin dashboard page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
